resources.string: 03/07/2016 at now, filelist find no files in the storage => fix 03/13/2016 add new activity for debug testing add two methods: create a file and delete a file in the debug activity 3/17/2016 almost rebuild the app still fail to find the stored files, maybe the database file is not stored or the way to find files is wrong == the database is stored, but cant to find it by file list method? == both way can create database files, the problem is to find them == got the way to find the database in the internal storage, the internal files system is that ..../ files = call getFilesDir() can get it / database = in this sub directory, the database file is in 3/18/2016 finish file system to show stored files in the internal storage show the existed database files 3/19/2016 in the read activity for now, touch to open the database to check achieve functions: open the database in the database crud activity listview and gridview does not support the addView method tablelayout support it but, it maybe to difficult to handle the onclick event... for now use table layout in the curd helper class show the data successfully layout problems 03/20/2016 in the crud helper class fix layout problem - table_row.add(insert_view) table.add(table_row) may not use setLayoutParams for now it works successful: 1. show the data in the table 2. insert the data into the database 03/21/2016 successful display and insert data in the different databases in test 03/22/2016 1. registerForContextMenu: if i override, etc in one activity class, does it work for other activities? == no, we need to re override in new activity 03/23/2016 1. actionmode problem: when use action in other method class, too many parameters need to care, try to do in the activity directly == done, successfully applied contextual menu but the ui need to fix 2. what is MenuInflater ==> try to display the data in the menu 03/25/2016 1. make ui simple, finish the main mission first - cancel contextual menu 2. big pic * project create new db, read db, upgrade db and delete db * database create new table, read tables, upgrade tables and delete tables * table create new data, read data, upgrade data and delete data 03/27/2016 1.
